Canons Pilates

Thank you for choosing to reserve a well deserved and rewarding spot at Canons Pilates! Please fill out the form below with your details and preferred class type. Once you have completed the booking form, you should receive a confirmation message by email.Please ensure you detail any medical issues you may have and special requirements you require on the day in the message section of the form, to ensure our instructor can accomodate you on the day. If required, a member of our team may call you back as soon as possible to ask further questions and discuss further.
